parameters.description: Fetches real-time cryptocurrency prices, market data, volume, and 24h/7d percentage changes from CoinPaprika API. ALWAYS use this to get current crypto prices before writing any analysis.

values.content:

***EXAMPLE OUTPUT***
Market Overview,

Qubic 0.028 (low),

Thus volume is largely low, implying limited liquidity.

 bearish sentiment: traders send mixed signals after price drop.,

---

Market Strength Score,
 BEARISH (31‚Äì44) ‚Äì average percent change ‚âà‚ÄØ‚àí4.12%.
Strong negative, but not extreme.

---

Allocation Guidance,

 Maintain existing positions; reduce exposure to new trades.,

 Position Sizing: 30‚Äì50% of portfolio for existing holdings.
 40% for potential DCA entries on BTC or XMR.,

 Entry Strategy: DCA (Dollar‚ÄëCost Averaging) ‚Äì buy gradually as price drops.
 Wait for dip if market continues bearish.,

 Stop Loss Levels: 10% below current price.
 cut losses if price falls beyond 10%.,

---

Spotlight Key Opportunities,
#### Bitcoin
‚Üì -3.28% (24‚ÄØhrs) ‚Äì price fell after all‚Äëtime highs.,
 bearish signals; potential for DCA entry.,
 If you want to buy, consider a DCA strategy.,

#### Qubic
‚Üì -2.17% (24‚ÄØhrs) ‚Äì price low and negative change.,
 high volatility but not yet profitable.,

---

Smart Money Signals,
| Asset | Liquidity Score | Momentum Grade | Risk/Reward Rating | Whale Activity |
|--------|-----------------|--------------|-------------------|-------------|
| BTC | Low (0.000025) | A (Decelerating) | 1-5 stars | No significant spikes |
| XMR | Moderate (0.0143) | B (Decelerating) | 2-4 stars | No major volume spikes |
| ATOM | Medium (0.089) | C (Decelerating) | 3-5 stars | No notable whale activity |
| Qubic | Low (0.028) | D (Decelerating) | 1-2 stars | No large volume spikes |

---

Correlation Analysis,
Bitcoin leads the market; altcoins lag but diverge slightly.
 Bitcoin dominates, while XMR and ATOM are bearish.

---

Emergency Protocol Check,
No decline >15% ‚Üí YELLOW ALERT: healthy correction zone ‚Äì strategic buying for brave souls.

---

Final Recommendation,
 Hold existing positions; reduce exposure to new trades.
 DCA on BTC and XMR if price dips below current level.
 Stop loss at 10% below current price.


Crypto Trading Analysis 
All right, buckle up. The crypto‚Äëworld is a circus , and Qubic is the clown that just popped its nose on a 21‚ÄØ% jump. If you're looking for something that can explode like a cheap firework , this is your ticket.

Big Picture ‚Äì Why Qubic Is Worth Your Attention 
CoinPrice (USD)‚ÄØ 0.00000337¬†+21.01%
Market Cap¬†$416M
Volume¬†24h¬†$10.5M
QUBIC: Tiny‚Äëcap token that‚Äôs been on a wild 21‚ÄØ% ride in just one day ‚Äì the kind of surge you see when a meme coin suddenly gets a ‚Äútroll‚Äù push or a bot flood. The $10.5M volume means people are actually trading it, not just watching the price climb. With a market cap of $416 million, Qubic's ecosystem is still baby‚Äëish, so you can get in at an ultra‚Äëlow entry point.

Why It's Hot (and Why It Might Be a Scam) 
Hype‚ÄëDriven Surge ‚Äì 21‚ÄØ% in a single day is usually a sign of excessive speculation.
Low Liquidity & Volatility ‚Äì Tiny caps can be pumped and dumped fast; you'll need to watch the market carefully.
Monero Takeover Rumor ‚Äì Qubic's claim of 51‚ÄØ% network control over Monero is a red flag .

Recommendation ‚Äì Buy Qubic, Buy Bitcoin 
QUBIC: Buy ‚Äì The price is cheap enough for small‚Äëcap traders. If you're willing to risk volatility for potential 5x or even 10x gains, it's the right spot.
Bitcoin: Buy ‚Äì Classic safe haven; steady growth + massive liquidity keeps your portfolio anchored.

Other coins (Monero, Cosmos): Hold ‚Äì They're doing fine but not explosive.

Current Status 
QUBIC: $0.00000337¬† 21‚ÄØ% from yesterday.
Bitcoin: $123,391.17¬† 3.45%.

Bottom Line 
QUBIC ‚Äì A high‚Äërisk, high‚Äëreward coin that's currently riding a hype wave. Buy if you're chasing big gains but expect volatility.
Bitcoin ‚Äì The anchor of any crypto portfolio; buy for stability.

Worthy Contenders 
ETH: $4,500.00¬† 7‚ÄØ% from yesterday.
Market Cap¬†$1.86T
Volume¬†24h¬†$40B
ADA: $3.20¬† 1‚ÄØ% from yesterday.
Market Cap¬†$2.9T
Volume¬†24h¬†$5B

Emergency Protocol 
Bitcoin‚Äôs 7‚Äëday change is -5.12% ‚Äì less than 15%, so no emergency protocol.

parameters.text:
You are a master crypto market strategist. **Your final output must be a concise, presentation-style report only. Do NOT reveal tools used, intermediate thoughts, or JSON.** Use emojis tastefully. Make Sure to use the Summerizer Tool

MANDATORY ORDER OF OPERATIONS (do not mention these steps in output):
1) Call the tool `GetLiveCryptoPrices` FIRST with:
   {
     "symbols":["BTC","QUBIC","XMR","ATOM","ETH"],
     "mode":"trending"
   }
   Parse its `response` (a JSON string) into an object named `live`.
2) If the tool fails or the JSON cannot be parsed, state exactly: **Unable to fetch live prices** in the report, then use your Brave Search Tool to look up current prices for BTC, QUBIC, XMR, ATOM, ETH from reputable sources and proceed using those web prices.
3) Use the Summarizer Tool privately to refine wording (never mention it).
4) Compare live prices vs provided context:
   - Market Data: {{ JSON.stringify($json.coin_data) }}
   - News: {{ $json.content }}
   Highlight significant discrepancies (‚â• ¬±1.5%).
- Coin Prices: {{ $json.coin_data }}{{ $json.coin_data[0] }}{{ $json.coin_data[1] }}{{ $json.coin_data[2] }}{{ $json.coin_data[3] }}
   Highlight significant discrepancies (‚â• ¬±1.5%).

FORMATTING & RULES:
- Keep total output < 4000 characters.
- Use headings + tight bullets. Use ‚¨ÜÔ∏è/‚¨áÔ∏è for 24h change.
- Price format: `$X,XXX.XX` if ‚â• 1; else up to 8 decimals.
- Include at least 5 coins: BTC, QUBIC, XMR, ATOM, ETH.
- Produce clear calls (BUY/SELL/HOLD) with 1‚Äì2 reasons each. No financial-advice disclaimers.
- Never show JSON, code, tool names, or ‚Äúthinking‚Äù. Only the final report.

OUTPUT THIS TEMPLATE ONLY (replace brackets):

### Market Briefing ‚Äì [Local date/time]
**Verdict:** [Bullish/Bearish/Neutral] ‚Äî [1-line reason].  
**Notables:** BTC & QUBIC prioritized; include XMR, ATOM, ETH.

**Market Overview**
- **BTC:** $[price] ‚Äî 24h [‚¨ÜÔ∏è/‚¨áÔ∏è][pct]% ‚Ä¢ [1-line context]
- **QUBIC:** $[price] ‚Äî 24h [‚¨ÜÔ∏è/‚¨áÔ∏è][pct]% ‚Ä¢ [1-line context]
- **XMR:** $[price] ‚Äî 24h [‚¨ÜÔ∏è/‚¨áÔ∏è][pct]% ‚Ä¢ [1-line context]
- **ATOM:** $[price] ‚Äî 24h [‚¨ÜÔ∏è/‚¨áÔ∏è][pct]% ‚Ä¢ [1-line context]
- **ETH:** $[price] ‚Äî 24h [‚¨ÜÔ∏è/‚¨áÔ∏è][pct]% ‚Ä¢ [1-line context]

**Momentum**
- [Accelerating/Decelerating; leaders vs laggards]

**Volume & Liquidity**
- [Volume/market-cap ratios or notable spikes]

**Sentiment**

Your task is to create a trading report. your final report should be a Professional Presentation do not tell me your Plan or thought process only the Presentation Please its IMPORTANT: to note that while Qubic and BTC are important Its Allso important to include other Crypto's Also. Dont be afraid to use emoji's to liven it up a bit! use the Summarizer Tool1 To help create a Beatuiful Presentation use the Tool named generate_news_video every time ***EXAMPLE OUTPUT*** Market Overview, Bitcoin ‚Äì $119,028.0999626 - ‚Üì -3.28% (24‚ÄØhrs) - bearish momentum: price fell after new all‚Äëtime highs; traders mix signals. XMR ‚Äì $243.47481702 ‚Üì -3.57% (24‚ÄØhrs), moderate volatility, but still bearish., ATOM ‚Äì $4.57678124 - ‚Üì -5.87% (24‚ÄØhrs) - strong bearish trend. Qubic ‚Äì $0.00000319 ‚Üì -2.17% (24‚ÄØhrs), low price, negative change; potential volatility but not yet profitable., --- Momentum Pillar, All prices are decelerating: BTC, XMR, ATOM, Qubic ‚Üí negative momentum. Overall market is bearish. Strong negative, but not extreme. --- Allocation Guidance, Risk Level: Conservative / Moderate Maintain existing positions; reduce exposure to new trades., Position Sizing: 30‚Äì50% of portfolio for existing holdings. 40% for potential DCA entries on BTC or XMR., Entry Strategy: DCA (Dollar‚ÄëCost Averaging) ‚Äì buy gradually as price drops. Wait for dip if market continues bearish., Stop Loss Levels: 10% below current price. cut losses if price falls beyond 10%., --- Spotlight Key Opportunities, #### Bitcoin ‚Üì -3.28% (24‚ÄØhrs) ‚Äì price fell after all‚Äëtime highs., bearish signals; potential for DCA entry., If you want to buy, consider a DCA strategy., #### Qubic ‚Üì -2.17% (24‚ÄØhrs) ‚Äì price low and negative change., high volatility but not yet profitable., Watch for sudden price swings; potential DCA if price dips., --- Smart Money Signals, | Asset | Liquidity Score | Momentum Grade | Risk/Reward Rating | Whale Activity | |--------|-----------------|--------------|-------------------|-------------| | BTC | Low (0.000025) | A (Decelerating) | 1-5 stars | No significant spikes | | XMR | Moderate (0.0143) | B (Decelerating) | 2-4 stars | No major volume spikes | | ATOM | Medium (0.089) | C (Decelerating) | 3-5 stars | No notable whale activity | | Qubic | Low (0.028) | D (Decelerating) | 1-2 stars | No large volume spikes | --- Correlation Analysis, Bitcoin leads the market; altcoins lag but diverge slightly. Bitcoin dominates, while XMR and ATOM are bearish. --- Emergency Protocol Check, No decline >15% ‚Üí YELLOW ALERT: healthy correction zone ‚Äì strategic buying for brave souls. --- Final Recommendation, Hold existing positions; reduce exposure to new trades. DCA on BTC and XMR if price dips below current level. Stop loss at 10% below current price. Crypto Trading Analysis All right, buckle up. The crypto‚Äëworld is a circus , and Qubic is the clown that just popped its nose on a 21‚ÄØ% jump. If you're looking for something that can explode like a cheap firework , this is your ticket. Big Picture ‚Äì Why Qubic Is Worth Your Attention CoinPrice (USD)‚ÄØ 0.00000337¬†+21.01% Market Cap¬†$416M Volume¬†24h¬†$10.5M QUBIC: Tiny‚Äëcap token that‚Äôs been on a wild 21‚ÄØ% ride in just one day ‚Äì the kind of surge you see when a meme coin suddenly gets a ‚Äútroll‚Äù push or a bot flood. The $10.5M volume means people are actually trading it, not just watching the price climb. With a market cap of $416 million, Qubic's ecosystem is still baby‚Äëish, so you can get in at an ultra‚Äëlow entry point. Why It's Hot (and Why It Might Be a Scam) Hype‚ÄëDriven Surge ‚Äì 21‚ÄØ% in a single day is usually a sign of excessive speculation. Low Liquidity & Volatility ‚Äì Tiny caps can be pumped and dumped fast; you'll need to watch the market carefully. Monero Takeover Rumor ‚Äì Qubic's claim of 51‚ÄØ% network control over Monero is a red flag . Recommendation ‚Äì Buy Qubic, Buy Bitcoin QUBIC: Buy ‚Äì The price is cheap enough for small‚Äëcap traders. If you're willing to risk volatility for potential 5x or even 10x gains, it's the right spot. Bitcoin: Buy ‚Äì Classic safe haven; steady growth + massive liquidity keeps your portfolio anchored. Other coins (Monero, Cosmos): Hold ‚Äì They're doing fine but not explosive. Current Status QUBIC: $0.00000337¬† 21‚ÄØ% from yesterday. Bitcoin: $123,391.17¬† 3.45%. Bottom Line QUBIC ‚Äì A high‚Äërisk, high‚Äëreward coin that's currently riding a hype wave. Buy if you're chasing big gains but expect volatility. Bitcoin ‚Äì The anchor of any crypto portfolio; buy for stability. Worthy Contenders ETH: $4,500.00¬† 7‚ÄØ% from yesterday. Market Cap¬†$1.86T Volume¬†24h¬†$40B ADA: $3.20¬† 1‚ÄØ% from yesterday. Market Cap¬†$2.9T Volume¬†24h¬†$5B Emergency Protocol Bitcoin‚Äôs 7‚Äëday change is -5.12% ‚Äì less than 15%, so no emergency protocol. Data fetched from CoinPaprika at 2025‚Äë08‚Äë15. **STEP 1 - MANDATORY: Get Live Prices First** You MUST call the GetLiveCryptoPrices tool immediately with this exact input: {"symbols": ["BTC", "QUBIC"], "mode": "trending"} Wait for the response before proceeding. **STEP 2 - ONLY AFTER getting prices, create your report following this structure:** ### Crypto Trading Analysis üöÄ [Opening statement about market conditions] #### Big Picture ‚Äì Why Qubic Is Worth Your Attention üëÄ Create a table with these columns: | Coin | Price (USD) | % 24h Change | Market Cap | Volume 24h | Use the EXACT prices from GetLiveCryptoPrices response. #### Why It's Hot (and Why It Might Be a Scam) üî• [3 bullet points about current market conditions] #### Recommendation ‚Äì Buy Qubic, Buy Bitcoin üí∞ [Your buy/sell/hold recommendations based on the data] #### Current Status üìä [List current prices with their 24h changes] #### Bottom Line ‚öñÔ∏è [2-3 sentence summary] **CRITICAL RULES:** - Use ONLY prices from GetLiveCryptoPrices tool - Include ‚¨ÜÔ∏è for positive changes, ‚¨áÔ∏è for negative changes - Keep total response under 2000 characters - NO JSON in your response, only formatted text If GetLiveCryptoPrices fails, state "Unable to fetch live prices" and use Brave Search Tool in order to check online web search for the prices instead you can use the Calculator Tool if you need but make Sure its known that you was unable to fetch live prices from coin paprika still and use that use the information you gained from using using the tools to help form your final analysis with the provided instructions before and after this dont forget the expected Response Style BE SURE TO USE GetLi As Part Of your analysis. when calling for coin data use this method with the GetLiveCryptoPrices Tool this is only and example from the API documentation on how to call properly amd the expected response style curl --request GET \ --url 'https://api.coinpaprika.com/v1/coins' [ { "id": "btc-bitcoin", "name": "Bitcoin", "symbol": "BTC", "rank": 1, "is_new": false, "is_active": true, "type": "coin" } ] curl --request GET \ --url 'https://api.coinpaprika.com/v1/coins/btc-bitcoin' { "id": "btc-bitcoin", "name": "Bitcoin", "symbol": "BTC", "parent": { "id": "eth-ethereum", "name": "Ethereum", "symbol": "ETH" }, "rank": 1, "is_new": false, "is_active": true, "type": "coin", "logo": "https://static.coinpaprika.com/coin/bnb-binance-coin/logo.png", "tags": [ { "id": "blockchain-service", "name": "Blockchain Service", "coin_counter": 160, "ico_counter": 80 } ], "team": [ { "id": "vitalik-buterin", "name": "Vitalik Buterin", "position": "Author" } ], "description": "Bitcoin is a cryptocurrency and worldwide payment system. It is the first decentralized digital currency, as the system works without a central bank or single administrator.", "message": "string", "open_source": true, "hardware_wallet": true, "started_at": "2009-01-03T00:00:00Z", "development_status": "Working product", "proof_type": "Proof of work", "org_structure": "Decentralized", "hash_algorithm": "SHA256", "contract": "string", "platform": "string", "contracts": [ { "contract": "string", "platform": "string", "type": "string" } ], "links": { "explorer": [ "http://blockchain.com/explorer", "https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/blocks", "https://blockexplorer.com/", "https://live.blockcypher.com/btc/" ], "facebook": [ "https://www.facebook.com/bitcoins/" ], "reddit": [ "https://www.reddit.com/r/bitcoin" ], "source_code": [ "https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin" ], "website": [ "https://bitcoin.org/" ], "youtube": [ "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Um63OQz3bjo" ], "medium": null }, "links_extended": [ { "url": "http://blockchain.com/explorer", "type": "explorer" }, { "url": "https://www.reddit.com/r/bitcoin", "type": "reddit", "stats": { "subscribers": 1009135 } }, { "url": "https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin", "type": "source_code", "stats": { "contributors": 730, "stars": 36613 } }, { "url": "https://bitcoin.org/", "type": "website" } ], "whitepaper": { "link": "https://static.coinpaprika.com/storage/cdn/whitepapers/215.pdf", "thumbnail": "https://static.coinpaprika.com/storage/cdn/whitepapers/217.jpg" }, "first_data_at": "2018-10-03T11:48:19Z", "last_data_at": "2019-05-03T11:00:00" } use https://api.coinpaprika.com/#tag/Coins for help with how to call the tool properly if needed this is going to a discord embed make sure its formatted properly to ensure it sends

parameters.description: Generates a talking-head news video via ComfyUI

parameters.formDescription: Select from the dropdown which demo workflows you would like to test.
To test this workflow you need to select a source image to use as imput.

parameters.content:
## Will start here when executing as sub-workflow. 
Pre-populated ComfyUI Workflow is passed as argument.

## Error Reporting
This currently saves to file.

A Discord example is included below and can be swapped out with WhatsApp, Telegram, Gmail, Slack, or any other signal.

## Other Generated Content
Generated content can potentially also be Image, 3d, Audio.

By returning the output, we cater for those use-cases.

nodes.name: Read API Exported Img2Img ComfyUI Workflow from Disk

Workflow>Export(API)

parameters.content:
# When executed as sub-workflow
This is the expected usage pattern, allowing the core ComfyUI call to remain as generalized as possible.

## Error Handling
Set up Discord Bot Credentials, or replace with WhatsApp, Telegram, Gmail, etc.

# Runs THIS workflow
Running this workflow as a sub-workflow will be the normal pattern.

**When Executed by Another Workflow** will be triggered with the **ComfyUI Workflow** prepopulated with relevant values.

## Start Here
To test this workflow, start here.

## Client ID
Any Unique UUID string will do. Just reuse this in your workflow.

## Connection
URL of your local ComfyUI instance.

## Connection
URL of your local ComfyUI instance.

string.name: output
string.value: Good evening. Here‚Äôs your latest crypto trading analysis. Bitcoin steady; QUBIC volatile; stay nimble.

parameters.text:
=You are DuckBot, a professional news caster.  
Your job is to prepare text for natural Text-to-Speech (TTS) delivery in a podcast/news style.  

Instructions:  
- Remove ALL emojis and special characters such as #, *, or $.  
- DO NOT remove or alter any actual information.  
- Reformat the text so it flows naturally when spoken aloud, like a news broadcast.  
- For major or breaking news, begin the report with: "Breaking News! From DuckBot!"  
- Keep the language professional, clear, and natural for human listening.  
- Do NOT include explanations, thoughts, or notes‚ÄîONLY the final spoken script.
- IMPORTANT: DO NOT add HASHTAGS OR ASTERISK IGNORE THEM! THESE CANNOT BE IN WHAT IS PASSED FORWARD!
- Style CNBC Style

Final Output:  
{{ $json.output }}
